mapper.insert: insert into tbl_qna (qna_num, qna_title, qna_content, qna_writer, qna_ref) values (seq_qna_num.nextval, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_writer}, seq_qna_num.nextval)

insert into tbl_qna (qna_num, qna_title, qna_content, qna_writer, qna_success, qna_ref, qna_restep, qna_relevel) values (seq_qna_num.nextval, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{qna_writer}, #{qna_success}, #{qna_ref}, 1, 1)
